extension.summary: Aeon MQ 7. Improved, lighter, and more powerful than ever.
Aeon MQ 7, melhorada, mais leve e mais poderosa do que nunca.
extension.description: The traditional Aeon MQ reaches its seventh edition.[CR]Aeon MQ 7 has all the features present in the previous version, however these resources are optimized in order to provide an even better user experience.[CR]Aeon MQ 7, you have never seen a skin like it.

A tradicional Aeon MQ chega a sua sétima edição.[CR]Aeon MQ 7 conta com todos os recursos presentes na versão anterior, no entanto, esses recursos foram otimizados afim de proporcionar uma experiência ainda melhor ao usuário.[CR]Aeon MQ 7, você nunca viu uma skin assim.
extension.news: Added: Support to ExtendedInfo Script - Open dialog. Improved: Small issues in layout/Info Dialog on top. Fixed: Home/Extras/Widgets - truncated information to released year and premiered. Fixed: Dialog Info-ExtendedInfo - Missing Poster Zoom. Fixed: PVR Info - Layout details. Fixed: Missing Genre Fanart inside library. Fixed: View PosterLite - option to disable media case does not work properly.
